MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G76 postcode area of Clarkston affecting properties in Randolph Drive and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs on an underground cable fault outside 134 Randolph Drive, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.00pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.58pm on Wednesday 7th April 2021.
